text:
NEWCOMERS SESSION
Wednesday, April 26 - 9:30 a.m, Ballroom
(All First-Timers at Institute Urged to Attend - Others Welcome)
Welcome to the Institute
........ I. Keith Tyler, Director
Institute for Education by Radio-Television
This Year's Institute Program
i .Richard B. Hull, Chairman
NAEB Board of Directors
Who's Here and Why? - Introductions ....... Harold B. McCarty, Gen. Mgr.
Station WHA Radio-Television, Madison, Wis.
Master of Ceremonies
10:40 - 11:00 Coffee Break
SPECIAL INTEREST ROUND-TABLE DISCUSSIONS
(An opportunity for newcomers to meet in small groups
with selected old-timers who speak from experience.)
